descriptionHtml:
Hey guys.
This is my first mod hopefully more to come.
Its an overhaul of the Alchemists Shack.
There are a few I know but this is my take on it so far.
So I think this is pretty much finished now.
Any more ideas or suggestions are more then welcome.

All containers are safe storage, except ones at the \"wreckage\" and \"hidden grove\"

There is also a \"hidden\" iron sword the previous owner left behind.
not a bad weapon if you ask me :)

Just add it to your normal Skyrim Data File.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Requirements?[/b][/color][/size]
Dawnguard and Hearthfires

Please if you like this let me know and endorse if you like. 
Not many people have let me know what they think of the mod.
I would love it if you could please.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]Updates?[/b][/color][/size]
Bug Fixes if any.

[size=+2][color=Red][b]History[/b][/color][/size]
-------
26-01-2013, Version 2.0: Now working.
Should be fully finished. Pretty much exactly what I want it to be.
Will add more after playing for a while if it needs it.
Suggestions are very welcome.

26-01-2013, Version 1.5: Now up and running.
Version 2.0 should be up in the next 24 hours.
Been working 8 hours on this non stop.

25-01-2013, Version 1.0: Initial Release.


[size=+4][color=Yellow][b]My Other Mods[/b][/color][/size]
Forties Sheogorath Load Screens 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32103/
Forties Sheogorath Dawnguard Load Screens 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32305
Forties A Nords Dos And Donts Of Skyrim
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32771
